creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych, attached and folded in album: male figures on horses in foreground and at L, possibly jousting; smaller groups in background, on other side of a low netted fence in military formations with guns and horses; spectators on pavilions built onto tiered hills at R
dimension:
14 × 28 in. (35.56 × 71.12 cm) (image, overall)
14 × 9 1/4 in. (35.56 × 23.5 cm) (object part, each panel)
marks: Signature, Title, and Seals Signed LLC: Yo_shu_ Kunichika | Title URQ
medium: Color woodblock print: ink and colors on paper
title: Changing Horses at Koganehara Station
